job.title: Senior User Experience Designer
job.description: <p>Bridgeview is currently seeking a Senior UX/UI Designer at one of our clients. If you love building and supporting technology solutions that make businesses successful, then read on for more details.</p><p><strong>TITLE:&nbsp;</strong>Senior UX/UI Designer</p><p><strong>LOCATION:</strong>&nbsp;Remote, with a preference for PST.</p><p><strong>HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT</strong></p><p>As a Senior UX/UI Designer on our team, you’ll be working to create a world-class web shopping experience for our customers. You can expect to partner closely with down-to-earth peers in UX, product management, and engineering, where we’ll count on you to help drive a user-centered approach to achieving business goals. You’ll fit right in if you’re an ambitious problem-solver who excels at understanding your users and synthesizing their needs into beautiful UI that feels as good as it looks.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>REQUIRED EXPERIENCE</strong></p><ul><li>Conceptualize, design, and validate intuitive and functional experiences alongside UX peers, product managers, engineers, and project stakeholders</li><li>Create and maintain wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and spec documentation to support product definition and development</li><li>Analyze interface and usability challenges and design solutions that meet user requirements and achieve business goals</li><li>Perform usability testing, user interviews, and quantitative analysis to understand user needs and behavior in an enterprise environment</li><li>Participate in ideation and scoping for new products and initiatives</li><li>Partner with Engineering and QA to ensure designs are implemented accurately</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>PREFERRED EXPERIENCE</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years of professional experience in User Experience or Product Design</li><li>A strong portfolio of work showcasing your product design and research capabilities (including case studies)</li><li>Proficiency in design software such as Figma (our primary tool), Zeplin, Sketch, inVision, and Adobe Creative Suite</li><li>A strong understanding of user-centered design, visual design, interaction design, and information architecture</li><li>Ability to clearly and confidently articulate design choices</li><li>Experience conducting user research, analyzing results, and synthesizing actionable insights for stakeholders and product partners</li><li>Desire to own all aspects of the design process and deliver conceptual sketches, wireframes, and pixel-perfect design comps</li><li>Ability to define, apply, and contribute to component-based design systems</li><li>Ability to effectively manage time in a fast-paced environment and respond flexibly to evolving needs</li><li>Experience working in an agile planning environment</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p></p>
